column4: "Tumdzi na suro yɛ Nyankopɔn dze; Ɔno na ɔyɛ asomdwee wɔ ne mbea sorɔnsorɔm mu."

column2: "Ana wobotum ebu no dɔm ano? Na woana na ne kan nnsoɛr no do?"
"Dasanyi besi dɛn atsen wɔ Nyankopɔn enyim? Anaa ɔbɛyɛ dɛn ma nyia ɔbaa awo no no no ho bɛtsew?"

column3: bosoom mpo mmpaa hyerɛɛn wɔ n’enyim
column4: Na nworaba so ho nntsew wɔ n’enyi do:"

column2: "Na akantam dasanyi a ɔyɛ nsaamaa yi! Na nyimpa ba a ɔyɛ abowaba yi!"
